title: (x) JCDA Inc sans serif-Rotis Sans Serif {Rob Jones}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054256im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-3_3518.jpg)

from jcdainc.com, James Carpenter Design Associates. I know i’m going to kick myself when this gets identified. I’m usually pretty good with these...

Thanks All!

 [‹ fromkeetra.com photobooth font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054256/http:/typophile.com/node/43609 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hype - Rounded Sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328054256/http:/typophile.com/node/43606 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Chipman223

comments.content:
Don’t believe dontbelievethetype ... just kiddin’.

Andrew, you can start kicking yourself.

Since i’m sitting, I’ve decided to punish myself by drinking the office coffee instead. I like being on the other side of the type IDs, but i have to admit, I’m not sure if i’ve ever seen Rotis before, so I don’t feel as bad.

Thanks Rob!
